alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Perry (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 25 at 7:57PM EDT until April 27 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 35 possible. * WHERE...In Ohio, Perry and Morgan Counties. In West Virginia, Taylor, Barbour and Northwest Randolph Counties. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
